description: **DUPLEX PORTFOLIO SALE** (1 of 3) All 3 NEWER construction duplex’s, 100% occupied and generates $15,156.00/Month or $181,872.00 Annually for ALL 3 duplex's. TURNKEY & cashflow day 1 of ownership. 10451 SW 179th St Miami, FL 33157 ($820K) & 10385 SW 173rd Ter Miami, FL 33157 ($820K) are part of the portfolio as well. The owner will consider selling each duplex separately for the right offer. Newer construction and built in 2021. Each unit has open floor plans, 3 beds 2 baths & 1,400SF each. All impact windows and doors. Granite countertops, SAMSUNG stainless steel appliances, concrete polished floors, laundry room with front end loader washer/dryer, RHEEM high efficiency AC unit, wood cabinetry in the kitchen, backyard space for each unit & separate electric/waters meters.

Welcome to 1315 SW 22nd—a versatile property offering an ideal living arrangement for a multi-generational family or a savvy investor seeking rental income. Please note this is a Single-Family home converted into a multi-generational type of property. There is only one electric and water meter. Conveniently located near the highway. The left side features 2bed & 1ba, complete with an inside washer & dryer & private backyard. The right side, offers a 1bed, 1ba unit with its own washer and dryer and a private yard. The property boasts new modern kitchens in both units,2010 roof, electrical panel (2010), 2/AC systems (2010 &2023), and partial re-piping in the same year. These updates contribute to the property's longevity. Discover a versatile and well-maintained living space at 1315 SW 22nd.

Phenomenal Multi-Family consists of a Charming Victoria Park House PLUS THREE ADDITIONAL separate rental cottages. Prime location in the Southeast corner of Victoria Park, close to Las Olas Blvd and Fort Lauderdale Beach. This Spacious 8750 sq ft lot includes a lovely 3/2 Main House [now being used as a 2/1 & efficiency] with original hardwood floors, updated kitchen and bathrooms and a fenced in backyard. In addition, there is a detached Studio and a Duplex that includes two 1bedroom /1bath apartments. All apartments have Granite Countertops and private outdoor patio. This property generates over $116, 000 in gross annual revenue, potential to generate $140, 000+ yielding above a 7% CAP. All units can be converted into Airbnb! Seller accepts Conventional Loans with only 5% Down Payment! See attached Documents for 'Estimated' P&L and Conforming Loan Limit Calculations

Spacious & Rare Victoria Park Family Compound on a 12,300+ sq corner ft lot! This Historically Designated Key West Style 1941 Bungalow has been maintained in pristine condition. A lovely sun drenched corner lot located in the heart of Fort Lauderdale’s prestigious Victoria Park neighborhood. Spacious Backyard, a Large Sunny Florida Room, Plenty of Parking and Room for a Pool!  A Charming 5 bedroom 4 bath property on a double lot (main house includes 3 bed & 2 bath, rear 2 story cottage includes 1- 1 bedroom & 1 bath apartment & 1- studio apartment with full kitchen). The rear 2 story cottage is currently a month to month rental, but can also be a guest house, office, in-law quarters or AIRB&B. Close to the beach, Las Olas Blvd, downtown, Flagler Village, shopping and FLL Airport.

address: 924 W Las Olas Blvd, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33312
description: Location-Location-Location. Prestigious Las Olas Blvd address in the beautiful historic Sailboat Bend neighborhood. 4 X 1BD units. Best for short term and vacation rentals and future townhomes development. Unique units with lots of details and charm. Plenty of parking. Room for a pool. 100% occupied. Impact windows. Current rents are below market, with potential to increase revenue at least by 50%. AirBNB potential for even a larger increase in revenue.   • Buyer will enjoy solid rental income and development options   • Walking distance to the Marina, Riverwalk and Performing Art Center   • All units individually metered   • Lush landscape, unique features.   DO NOT DISTURB TENANTS. Showings available with proof of funds.  Listing agent is a partial owner of the property.
Duplex for sale,units are tenant occupied rented at $1700 a month and can be increased much higher

Investment Opportunity, multifamily, AirBNB, Motel.  16 units (14 studios, 2 one bedrooms) + bonus. (4 shell condition studios with plumbing).  Renovated, impact windows, new roof, etc.    Minimum potencial income as Multifamily:  14 studios $1,300 month = $218,400 YEAR / 2 one bedrooms $1,500 month = $36,000 YEAR.  Minus expenses:  $35,000 YEAR.  Total NOI:  $219,400 YEAR.  Equal 11.2%  Cap. Rate.
BEST DUPLEX ON THE MARKET. NEWER WINDOWS, NEWER KITCHENS. QUIET AREA. CORNER LOT. BIG YARD.  NEXT TO PASSIVE CITY PARK.

A charming duplex, with great elevation, in Riverside Park on a quiet dead-end street. Pride of ownership evident! Two 1 BED/1 BATH units with large bedrooms, walk-in closets, separate kitchen/dining and living areas. Both units feature mini-split A/C units. Bedroom and living room floors are revarnished Dade County pine. Kitchen's are tiled and both bathrooms are in exceptional condition for being original to the build date. Mature oak trees in both front and backyard bring character to this property. One unit presently rented $1500/MO the other $1300/MO. Both month-to-month. Separate electric meters. Owner pays for water, sewer, and trash. Dade County approved hurricane shutters present. Roof 2007. Approximately 6000 SF lot. RM-15 Zoning.

Large rental ready duplex! 3 bed 2 bath and 2 bed 2 bath spacious units in desirable Croissant Park. TENANT OCCUPIED, DO NOT DISTUIRB TENANTS! READ BROKER REMARKS DO NOT DISTURB TENANTS! NO SHOWINGS, SUBMIT OFFERS CONTINGENT ON 1 TIME WALKTHROUGH AND APPROVAL. TEXT ONLY.

**LARGE $20,000 PRICE REDUCTION to move quickly**Duplex investment opportunity located in the revitalization area of Sistrunk Fort Lauderdale (6th Street). Two spacious 2 bedroom / 1 bath units month-to-month tenants (market rents $1,900-$2,000 monthly). Quiet neighborhood close to I95. 10 minutes of Downtown Fort Lauderdale & Las Olas Blvd. Right down the street from the new Sistrunk Marketplace & Brewery. New roof (2017), nice kitchen cabinets & stainless steel appliances. Strong long term hold with pro-forma 8% cap. Do not disturb tenants. Area revitalization activity attached in supplements. Offers to be submitted before access. CASH TERMS preferred. Proof of funds or pre-approval letter required with all offers. Text Thomas for fastest response and to receive interior/exterior videos. ***PROOF OF FUNDS or PRE-APPROVAL required to schedule access***
